results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/19]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The referendum - the referendum for the enlargement of the Common Market. 2. In the news: Rural equipment - in Valence, a new architectural design for a water-tower. Gold engravings by Tremois - solid gold engravings. 3. French publications - authors, publications and publishers. 4. Plant-life and the atom - the X-ray Agronomical Laboratories of the Cadarache Nuclear Studies Center. 5. In the overseas France museum - rare specimens.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/11]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Crystal bestiary - crystal and gilt blocs by Baccarat and Chaumet. Clouds and pollution - the fight against atmospheric pollution. 4. The Belgian surrealists - the “Painters of fantasy”.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/07]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1.The world on the move: President Pompidou in Africa - the French President’s visit to Niger and Chad. Growth of the Common Market - Britain, Ireland, Denmark and Norway join the European Economic Community. Concorde galore - the three Concordes meet in England. The Duke of Edinburgh takes the controls. Racing cars - the racing car show in Paris. Motion and life - a “Motion in art” exhibition. 2. Nijinsky, the heavenly buffoon - Maurice Bejart’s Ballet - the 20th Century Ballet’s new show.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/47]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The 25th anniversary of UNESCO - President Pompidou at the 25th anniversary celebrations. French liqueurs - international press tour the large French Liqueur distilleries. Homage to a conductor - former French operatic conductor Henri Buser will soon be 100 years old. 2. The fight against pollution - the Plant Biology laboratory of the Grenoble Nuclear Research Center. 3. Stamps for General de Gaulle - a commemorative issue on the eve of de Gaulle’s death anniversary. 4. Paul Valery - at the French National Library, an exhibition on the occasion of the centenary of French poet, Paul Valery’s birth.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 69/52]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Modern city planning - a bird’s eye-view of new trends in France’s housing developments. 2. The big problem of youth - old and new methods of checking and testing the physical and psychological aptitudes of France’s recruits. Visit to Vincennes’ new “Selection Center No. 1”. 3. Today’s theatre - in Paris, the old Sarah Bernhardt Theatre is replaced by the “ultra-modern” City Theatre run by Jean Mercure. 4. Ushering out the old year: Christmas at the Palais de l’Elysee. Yuletide Paris Circus Gala.
